The use of yellow, red, and bold fonts invokes a sense of emergency consistent with 'recall' and 'catastrophic failure.'
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: There is close alignment between the thumbnail and the title. The only minor contrast is that the thumbnail only references 'GM 6.2,' narrowing focus to a specific engine, while the title more broadly refers to 'Nearly 1M Vehicles.'
